data.title: Fiber and Wireless Internet
data.meta_description: Enjoy the fastest internet connection in the Great Lakes Region with Whole-Home WiFi and a rate lock guarantee. Plans start at $35/mo. Call 888-274-6381 now.
data.text:
ˆFaster upload speeds based on combined upload and download capacity versus major cable providers: Xfinity, Spectrum, and Cox 1 Gig cable service. Internet speeds based on hard wired connection. Actual speed test results may vary up to 20%.

*Pricing and promotional offers are available for a limited time and are subject to change. Valid to new, residential/business customers only. Plan pricing includes a $5 discount for being enrolled in Auto-Pay. If you do not want to be enrolled in Auto-Pay an additional $5 fee will be applied to your monthly charges. If you wish to receive a paper statement an additional $5 fee will be applied.Added fees may be required for additional equipment and services. Internet speeds are not guaranteed and may vary by equipment, number of users/devices and other factors outside of Surf’s control. 2 Gig, 1 Gig and 500 Mbps service not available in some areas. Price-lock for life applies to the current plan for length of service. All-in Pricing refers to the inclusion of equipment fees and taxes in internet package prices only. Restrictions apply. Faster upload speeds based on combined upload and download capacity versus major cable providers: Xfinity, Spectrum, and Cox 1 Gig cable service. Internet speeds based on hard wired connection. Actual speed test results may vary up to 20%.

WholeHome WiFi powered by eero is a product of EERO LLC, and managed by Surf Internet. Free eero Whole-Home WiFi offer includes 1 eero device with 100 Mbps, 500Mbps and 1 Gig speed plans; 2 eero devices 2 Gig speed plans.; additional eero devices may be required at an extra cost. Restrictions apply. ©2024 Surf Internet.

Surf Internet quarterly NPS ranking as of 03/20/2024 of 68 compared to industry average of 6. SOURCES: satmetrix. com | NICE Satmetrix 2022 Consumer Net Promoter Benchmark Study Net Promoter, Net Promoter Score, and NPS are trademarks of NICE Systems, Inc., Bain & Company, Inc., and Fred Reichheld

Referral program available to existing Surf Internet customers (referrer). Customers may refer up to 5 new or qualified former Surf customers per calendar year. For each referral that results in a new activation, the referrer will receive a $50 one time statement credit 60 days after the referee’s installation date. Program statement credits are not redeemable for cash. Terms and restrictions apply. Offer ends 9/30/2024.
